idea-plugin.name: xPlugin
idea-plugin.description: This is an idea plugin tool helps you to store multi-type entries(texts, images, files etc.) in your copyboard. With this plugin installed, your pasteboard is well organized and data entries in it are saved structuredly rather than keeps only one entry. Main Features: - Unlimited entry storage: Stores all your copyboard entries and builds a pasteboard library. You can save as many as entries you want. - Multi-type support: Supports text, image, files and more. All types of entries from your clipboard will be identified and saved well. - Tagging and searching: You can tag your entries for fast filtering and search. Quickly find what exactly you need. - Entry relationship: Related entries can be linked together. For example, attach an image to a text entry. This builds connections between relevant data entries. - Sync and backup: Entries are automatically synced and backed up in the cloud. No worries about data loss. - Entry versioning: Entry modifications are versioned. You can review history versions and restore if needed. - More advanced features: Such as batch paste, entry alias, parent-child relationship between entries etc. Use this plugin and say goodbye to a messy clipboard! Keep your pasteboard organized and data entries well preserved. A handy tool for any knowledge workers, bloggers, coders and more.
